trans-unit.source: A collection of <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxCategory"></xref> objects.

This class is <xref uid="langword_csharp_sealed" name="sealed" href=""></xref> and so cannot be inherited.This class provides support for the categorization of toolbox items when re-hosting the [!INCLUDE[wfd1](~/add/includes/wfd1-md.md)] outside of [!INCLUDE[vs2010](~/add/includes/vs2010-md.md)].
Creates an instance of the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxCategoryItems"></xref> class.
Adds a specified toolbox category to the end of the toolbox category items collection.
The <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxCategory"></xref> to add to the collection.
The item is .
Removes all the items from the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxCategoryItems"></xref> collection.
Determines whether the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxCategoryItems"></xref> collection contains a specific toolbox category item.
The toolbox category item to look for.
if the item is found in the ; otherwise, .
The item is .

Copies the entire <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxCategoryItems"></xref> collection to a compatible one-dimensional <xref:System.Array>, starting at the specified index of the target <xref:System.Array>.
The elements are copied to the <xref:System.Array> in the same order in which the enumerator iterates through the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxCategory> collection.
The one-dimensional <xref:System.Array> that is the destination of the elements copied from the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxCategoryItems"></xref> collection.
The <xref:System.Array> must have zero-based indexing.
The zero-based index of the target array.
The array is .
Gets the number of tools contained in the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxCategoryItems"></xref>.
<xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxCategoryItems> implements the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> interface.
The number of elements contained in the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxCategoryItems"></xref>.
Returns an enumerator that iterates through the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxCategoryItem> collection.
Enumerators can be used to read the data in a collection, but they cannot be used to modify the underlying collection.
Initially, the enumerator is positioned before the first element in the collection.
At this position, <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerator%601.Current> is undefined.

Therefore, you must call <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext> to advance the enumerator to the first element of the collection before reading the value of <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerator%601.Current>.
An enumerator remains valid as long as the collection remains unchanged.
If changes are made to the collection, such as adding, modifying, or deleting elements, the enumerator is no longer valid and its behavior is undefined.
The enumerator does not have exclusive access to the collection; therefore, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure.
An <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator%601> for the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxCategoryItems"></xref>.
Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxCategoryItems"></xref> is read-only.
<xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxCategoryItems> implements the <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
A collection that is read-only does not allow the addition, removal, or modification of elements after the collection is created.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxCategoryItems"></xref> is read-only; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets the toolbox category at the specified index.
<xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxCategoryItems> implements the <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
This property provides the ability to access a specific element in the collection by using the following syntax: `myCollection[index]`.
The zero-based index of the toolbox category item to get.
The toolbox category <xref:System.Object> at the specified index.
Removes the first occurrence of a specific toolbox category from the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxCategoryItems"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxCategory"></xref> to remove.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the item is found and removed from the collection; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
This method returns if the item specified is not found.

Copies the entire <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxCategoryItems"></xref> collection to a compatible one-dimensional <xref:System.Array>, starting at the specified index of the target <xref:System.Array>.
The elements are copied to the <xref:System.Array> in the same order in which the enumerator iterates through the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxCategory> collection.
The one-dimensional <xref:System.Array> that is the destination of the elements copied from the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxCategoryItems"></xref> collection.
The <xref:System.Array> must have zero-based indexing.
The zero-based index of the target array.
The array is .
Gets the number of toolbox categories contained in the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxCategoryItems"></xref> collection.
<xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxCategoryItems> implements the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> interface.
The number of items contained in the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxCategoryItems"></xref> collection.
Gets a value that indicates whether access to the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxCategoryItems"></xref> is synchronized (thread safe).
<xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxCategoryItems> implements the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> interface.

The <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxCategory.System%23Collections%23ICollection%23SyncRoot%2A> property returns an object, which can be used to synchronize access to the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxCategoryItems>.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if access to the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxCategoryItems"></xref> is synchronized (thread safe); otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets an object that can be used to synchronize access to the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxCategoryItems"></xref>.
<xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxCategoryItems> implements the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> interface.
An object that can be used to synchronize access to the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxCategoryItems"></xref>.
Returns an enumerator that iterates through the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxCategoryItem> collection.
Enumerators can be used to read the data in a collection, but they cannot be used to modify the underlying collection.
Initially, the enumerator is positioned before the first element in the collection.
At this position, <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerator%601.Current> is undefined.

Therefore, you must call <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext> to advance the enumerator to the first element of the collection before reading the value of <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerator%601.Current>.
An enumerator remains valid as long as the collection remains unchanged.
If changes are made to the collection, such as adding, modifying, or deleting elements, the enumerator is no longer valid and its behavior is undefined.
The enumerator does not have exclusive access to the collection; therefore, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure.
An <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator%601> for the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxCategoryItems"></xref>.
Adds a tool to the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxCategoryItems"></xref>.
<xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxCategoryItems> implements the <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
The position into which the new element is inserted.
The zero-based index of the tool added to the collection.
The value is of a type that is not assignable to the implemented by the collection.
Removes all the tools from the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxCategoryItems"></xref>.
<xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxCategoryItems> implements the <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
Determines whether the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxCategoryItems"></xref> contains a specific tool.
<xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxCategoryItems> implements the <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
The tool <xref:System.Object> to locate in the collection.
if the value is found in the ; otherwise, .
The value is .
Determines the index of a specific tool in the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxCategoryItems"></xref>.
<xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxCategoryItems> implements the <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
The object to locate in the <xref:System.Collections.IList>.
The index of value if found in the list; otherwise, -1.
The value is .
Inserts a toolbox category into the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxCategoryItems"></xref> collection at the specified index.
<xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxCategoryItems> implements the <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
If `index` equals the number of items in the <xref:System.Collections.IList>, then `value` is appended to the end.
In collections of contiguous elements, such as lists, the elements that follow the insertion point move down to accommodate the new element.
If the collection is indexed, the indexes of the elements that are moved are also updated.
The zero-based index at which `value` should be inserted.
The <xref:System.Object> inserted into the collection.
The index is not valid for the collection.
The value is .
The collection is read-only or has a fixed size that has been exceeded.
Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxCategoryItems"></xref> has a fixed size.
<xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxCategoryItems> implements the <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxCategoryItems"></xref> has a fixed size; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxCategoryItems"></xref> is read-only.
<xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxCategoryItems> implements the <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
A collection that is read-only does not allow the addition, removal, or modification of elements after the collection is created.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxCategoryItems"></xref> is read-only; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets or sets the toolbox category at a specified index of the collection.
<xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxCategoryItems> implements the <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
This property provides the ability to access a specific element in the collection by using the following syntax: `myCollection[index]`.
The zero-based index of the toolbox category item to get or set.
The toolbox category<xref:System.Object> at the specified index.
The value set is .
Removes the first occurrence of a specific toolbox category from the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxCategoryItems"></xref>.
<xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxCategoryItems> implements the <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
In collections of contiguous elements, such as lists, the elements that follow the removed element move up to occupy the vacated spot.
If the collection is indexed, the indexes of the elements that are moved are also updated.
The tool <xref:System.Object> to remove from the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxCategoryItems"></xref> collection.
Removes a toolbox category at the specified index of the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxCategoryItems"></xref> collection.
<xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolboxCategoryItems> implements the <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
In collections of contiguous elements, such as lists, the elements that follow the removed element move up to occupy the vacated spot.
If the collection is indexed, the indexes of the elements that are moved are also updated.
The zero-based index of the toolbox category item to remove.
The index is not valid for the collection.
